enWisdom: Generosity is [true] leadership, sovereignty is [only] administration
Tolerance is the embellishment of politics [and leadership]
Good administration is the mainstay of the citizenry

Wisdom: حُسْنُ التَّدْبِيرِ وَتَجَنُّبُ التَّبْذِيرِ مِنْ حُسْنِ السِّيَاسَةِ
enWisdom: Good planning and keeping away from wastefulness are from good politics
The excellence of leadership is [in] good governance
One whose administration is good, obeying him becomes obligatory
One whose administration is good, his leadership lasts
One who governs [and trains] his soul has [truly] comprehended [the art of] administration
One who extends his goodness [to the people] deserves leadership

Wisdom: مَنْ سَمَا إِلَى الرِّئَاسَةِ صَبَرَ عَلَى مَضَضِ السِّيَاسَةِ
enWisdom: One who aspires to rise to power is patient in the face of the torment of politics

Wisdom: مَنْ قَصُرَ عَنِ السِّيَاسَةِ صَغُرَ عَنِ الرِّيَاسَةِ
enWisdom: One who falls short in administration [and politics] is poor in [and incapable of] leadership

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّخَذَ الْحَقَّ لِجَاماً اتَّخَذَهُ النَّاسُ إِمَاماً
enWisdom: One who takes the truth as his reins, the people will take him to be their leader
The foundation of administration is justice
There is no leadership like [practicing] justice in administration
The most difficult of administrative policies is the removal of habits [and customs]
